cab.content: S DOCUuEIiT IS THE PRQi-ERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT-.CRET,.6274.A.. / WAR CABINET.FUTURE POLICY III RUSSIA AND NEIGHBOURING.COUNTRIES.Copy of Minute from Director of Military Operations to Secretary,' War Cabihet". ; ",V/ar Office,Whitehall, . - S.W.1.0149/5659. (M.C.5.) , 14th November, 1918.The Secretary, War Cabinet..With reference to Paper of the above number, and bearing War Cabinet No. G.T.6274.,. of 13th November, please substitute following for para. 5, Appendix "A". (Draft instructions for Major-General Poole):-"5. You should visit General Milne on your outward journey,, and you should report to that officer, under whose general authority and subject to whose further instructions (should such be necessary) you will proceed. Similarly, on your return journey you should, furnish General Milne with a copy of your report."(Sd) R. STEEL.Colonel,G. S.for D, M, 0,mi-
